### Exercise 5 

#### Creating a ggplot

Please use `ggplot2` to show the relationship of `displ`(on the x-axis) and `cty`(on the y-axis) in `mpg`.

```{r cyl, exercise=TRUE}

```

```{r cyl-solution}
library(tidyverse)
ggplot(data = mpg) + 
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = cty))
```
